timeline.bodyText:
Instead of modalOverlay and openInNewTab flags,
pls introduce an enum, called OpenTarget: SAME_TAB, SAME_TAB_OVERLAY, NEW_TAB.
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca
teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
pls precisely set the targetTab, even if we have a default defined.
This will make the code more readable and robust.
